name: The Jolly Gang's Misadventures in Africa / Масяня в полной Африке
description: Join the Jolly Gang as it heads to Africa in search of treasure! Features retro-cartoon graphics, rib-cracking one-liners, and challenging puzzles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
